vision: Imagine a world where mobile apps enhance our lives without invading our privacy. That's what Fossify strives for. We envision a thriving community of people working together to create free, open-source apps that benefit everyone. Join us and build a more secure, user-friendly digital future, one app at a time.
mission: Building privacy-first mobile apps for everyone. Fossify revives the legacy of @SimpleMobileTools, crafting open-source tools that are ad-free and easy to use. We empower individuals and communities with technology that respects their privacy and keeps things simple.
